GetEnableFieldsCondition

public static string GetEnableFieldsCondition(string $table, string $type='default', string $alias=null, mixed $SystemType=null)

Returns condition which will filter out records with start/end times or hidden/fe_groups fields set to values that should de-select them according to the current time, preview settings or user login.
Works for FE and BE Is using the $TCA arrays "ctrl" part where the key "enablefields" determines for each table which of these features applies to that table.

Parameters

$table -
$type -
$alias -
$SystemType -
